message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me to consider.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,500?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,800?
